## Utils.compare() function

Compare two ranges.

This function is useful for sorting arrays of [Comparable](./nifty-tou.comparable.md) objects.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function compare<T extends Comparable<T>>(l: T, r: T): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  l | T | the left value |
|  r | T | the right value |

**Returns:**

number

`-1`<!-- -->, `0`<!-- -->, or `1` if `l` is less than, equal to, or greater than `r`
